Description: This policy is designed for the FORTE Token

Rules.Name: TransferFromRule
Rules.Condition: ((((TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "E" AND TR:addrTrackerX(to) == true) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "M" AND (TR:addrTracker(to) == "S" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "E"))) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "T" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "T")) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "STK" AND (TR:addrTrackerX(to) == true AND FC:isKYCd_to2 == true))) OR (TR:addrTracker(to) == "STK" AND (TR:addrTrackerX(senderX) == true AND FC:isKYCd_from2 == true))
